title: Introducing: Shadow Culture
body:
With their debut track recorded live in a warehouse, and with some of the slickest looking press shots I’ve seen recently, London six piece (yep, six piece, not many of those around nowadays) **Shadow Culture** clearly have big plans.

The track in question, _Demons_, a live take, is a brilliantly over the top, albeit slightly rough around the edges, post-rock inspired number. Difficult to truly judge, but the ambition is certainly there, and that’s enough in itself to merit **Shadow Culture** status as one to watch.
